p: Mosquito samples were titrated by focus fluorescent assay on Ae. albopictus C6/36 cells in 96-well plates [ 18]. After 5 days of incubation at 28Â°C, plates were stained using antibodies specific to YFV as the primary antibody and conjugated Alexa Fluor 488 goat anti-mouse IgG as the second antibody (Life Technologies, California, USA).
